strapiPost.title: Spinning on the Street
strapiPost.content:
If you’ve ever wanted to give the pottery wheel a spin, October is your opportunity. 

  • Street smarts: The Community Creative Center in Fayetteville is hosting ‘Pottery on the Patio’ the first four Saturdays in October at the Nadine Baum Studios on Spring Street. The series of events is completely free.
  • Art days: The center will be hosting mini lessons on the pottery wheel, providing a sidewalk chalk mural space along with plenty of opportunity for other crafts and activities. Music and food will be present too, so you might just have to make your way out. 

For more info click HERE.
